abstract_summ: The most frequently-reported symptoms were fever/pyrexia (65%), cough (56%), body aches/pain (40%), headache (35%), fatigue (35%) and dyspnea (34%) Mild symptoms, such as anosmia (26%) and ageusia (24%) were frequently reported on Twitter, but not in clinical studies . Public social media data can be usefully harnessed to predict infection cases and inform timely responses .
